name: Curve rETH Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ETH and rETH, a token that represents staked ether in StaFi, an ETH 2.0 staking platform.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ETH and rETH, a token that represents staked ether in StaFi, an ETH 2.0 staking platform.

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ETH and rETH, a token that represents staked ether in StaFi, an ETH 2.0 staking platform.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este grupo contiene ETH y rETH, un token que representa éter en staking en StaFi, una plataforma de staking de ETH 2.0.

de.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ETH and rETH, a token that represents staked ether in StaFi, an ETH 2.0 staking platform.

pt.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ETH and rETH, a token that represents staked ether in StaFi, an ETH 2.0 staking platform.

el.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ETH and rETH, a token that represents staked ether in StaFi, an ETH 2.0 staking platform.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu havuz, bir ETH 2.0 staking platformu olan StaFi'de stake edilen ether'i temsil eden bir token olan ETH ve rETH'yi içerir.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ETH and rETH, a token that represents staked ether in StaFi, an ETH 2.0 staking platform.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 ETH 和 rETH，rETH 是由 ETH 2.0 质押平台 StaFi 发行的质押以太币。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve लिक्विडिटी पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में भी जमा कर सकते हैं। इस पूल में ETH और rETH शामिल हैं, एक टोकन जो StaFi में स्टेक्ड ईथर का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है, एक ETH 2.0 स्टेकिंग प्लेटफॉर्म।
